_sText:
UPDATE: this map is very outdated and doesn't work properly on the new engine. There is an updated version available on the Garry's Mod workshop here: link
mountainside by Dr. Spud
(I don't include a prefix on the name, since this isn't a standard map) Welcome to a section of highway on the way up to Big Bear Lakes, California. Hang out, takes some pictures, and enjoy. This map is built from the ground up to show what kind of graphics the episode 1 source engine is capable of. Centered around a long section of highway based on real locations in California mountain ranges, there is plenty here to see. Please note that this map IS NOT INTENDED FOR GAMEPLAY. While I've included spawns and buyzones, the map is not designed for balanced play. (Although, I could see a few of snipers having some fun maybe)
Features
  • dozens of new models and textures
  • huge size
  • NAV file
  • custom content zipped to the bsp.
All custom content is made by Dr. Spud and may not be re-used.
More by Dr. Spud Check out my bomb/defuse map, de_glacier For a casual fight yard map, check out fy_highrise_09 And for another fight yard map, try my remake of fy_snow, fy_snow_07
